messages.message:
I had attempted to add and set ENABLE_READER_PAGE to true
however after that was getting PermissionDenied error while running the flow, likely due to some missing key.
Didnt investigate further in depth for the missing key

> can we think about removing these env vars entirely? Noticed a TODO on one of them
Yeah. can look into it this week. Thanks for the change!

Right now crafting in half-broken stage for me: after setting enable_reader_page to true in local config I'm getting permission error on the flow run and Form Recognizer error when I try to upload files to build.

If I disable table recognition it starts working (with no ability to extract tables)
